apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a man and woman, both with medium skin tones, holding hands with a tender, supportive gesture, their forms defined by Apple's smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading. The connection between them is palpable, conveying a sense of unity, partnership, and shared journey. This beautifully rendered representation of companionship on Apple devices is perfect for celebrating relationships and mutual support.
